description: This file defines external API function prototypes for the Simplex Connector component within the ANSC framework. It includes function declarations for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the connector, as well as a relay function. The file also contains licensing and descriptive comments.

methods.name: AnscCreateSimplexConnector
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Simplex Connector.

methods.name: AnscScoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new Simplex Connector object.

methods.name: AnscScoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified Simplex Connector object.

methods.name: AnscScoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls objects required by the Simplex Connector.

methods.name: AnscScoRelay
methods.description: Handles relay operations for the Simplex Connector.
